Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers will try to make it 10 straight wins when they host the Charlotte Hornets at 6 p.m. Jan. 5 at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.
The Cavaliers have the NBA’s best record at 30-4, while the Hornets are 7-26 and have lost nine straight games.
Coach Kenny Atkinson expressed confidence in his team's road mentality and resilience, highlighting their collective confidence and expectation to win.
